page.title: 15Wivelsfield - Housing
page.content:
The majority of the homes in the area are{owner occupied.}The houses vary greatly between very old cottages and modern houses.{House prices}are amongst the highest in the country.
A number of pre-fabricated{council {houses}with structural faults were recently demolished in Wivelsfield Green and the local council has now built an attractive small estate to replace them.
It is unlikely that{planning {permission}would be given for any large scale development in the area. The council has a policy of allowing 'infil' only. The small amount of land left, which can be built on, sells at a premium.
